name: 李明哲
objective: This course will introduce the fundamentals of "Deep Learning" and "Internet of Things." Students interested in these subjects are welcome to take this course. Instead of going through detailed programming, this course focuses specifically on the application aspect. Therefore, students will be asked to study and report how state-of-the-art technology works nowadays. In addition, no particular prerequisites are required to take this preliminary course. Hopefully, this course will help initiate students' understanding of "Deep Learning" and "Internet of Things" and prepare them a more colorful career path in the future. The evaluation will be performed based on homework and reports. No examinations will be given.
schedule:
1-2. Introduction to Deep Learning, 
3-4. Supervised Learning, 
5-6. Unsupervised Learning, 
7-8. Internet of Things, 
9-10. Perception Layer, 
11-12. Network Layer, 
13-14. Application Layer, 
15-18. Deep Learning and Internet of Things
consultation: Course consultation will be provided through email or line.
